author: Noah Berlatsky, Noah Berlatsky
title: The last thing we need to hear right now is that Boris Johnson will defeat coronavirus because he's a 'fighter'
description: That kind of talk is dangerous — especially with this virus
content: After British Prime Minister Boris Johnson was moved to intensive care on Monday night to treat symptoms of Covid-19, political allies moved quickly to express sympathy.  Many of them did so specifically by praising his health and vigor, and insisting that hi… [+4674 chars]
